name: Richland Township School Authority, Appellant, v. Rea Construction Company

judges: Before Musmanno, Jones, Coiien, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Richland Township School Authority, Appellant, v. Rea Construction Company.

casebody.head_matter:
Richland Township School Authority, Appellant, v. Rea Construction Company.
Argued October 1, 1963.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Coiien, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
James T. Collie, Jr., with him Burg win, Ruffin, Perry & PoM, for appellant.
Bread R. P. Leonard, with him Royston, Robb, Leonard, Edgecombe & Miller, for appellee.
November 27, 1963:
